entities.name: kreecher
entities.description: Kreacher is an elf who is being teased by Peeves. He is described as having a mistress and being a master, implying that he has some sort of authority or status.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who intervenes in the fight between Kreacher and Peeves. He knocks out half of Kreacher's teeth with his fist.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is a poltergeist who is causing trouble in the room. He is described as 'happily' pelting bits of chalk at the elves and egging them on to fight.

entities.name: mudbloods
entities.description: Mudbloods are a group of people who are described as being associated with Kreacher's master. The term is used in a derogatory way, implying that they are somehow inferior or impure.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the students who intervenes in the fight between Kreacher and Peeves. He uses his wand to cast a spell on Peeves, causing him to clutch at his throat.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who intervenes in the fight between Kreacher and Peeves. He helps Harry to wrench the two elves apart.

relationships.description: Peeves is teasing Kreacher, pelting him with bits of chalk and egging him on to fight.
Dobby defeats Kreacher by knocking out half of his teeth with his fist.
Harry casts a spell on Peeves, causing him to clutch at his throat and leave the room.
